event.description: Eduardo Nunez called out on strikes.
Brandon Belt doubles (4) on a fly ball to left fielder Khris Davis.
Hunter Pence strikes out swinging.
Jarrett Parker walks.
Conor Gillaspie hit by pitch. Brandon Belt to 3rd. Jarrett Parker to 2nd.
Chris Marrero flies out to left fielder Khris Davis.
Aaron Hill grounds out, third baseman Ryon Healy to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Nick Hundley singles on a line drive to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Gorkys Hernandez doubles (9) on a soft fly ball to right fielder Matt Joyce. Nick Hundley to 3rd.
Eduardo Nunez lines into a double play, pitcher Andrew Triggs to third baseman Ryon Healy. Nick Hundley out at 3rd.
Brandon Belt grounds out sharply, third baseman Ryon Healy to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Hunter Pence strikes out swinging.
Jarrett Parker flies out to left fielder Khris Davis.
